title: NER recognition

labels.name: repro
labels.description: 涉及到旧版代码的问题(repro)

body:
Hi 
 I was getting assertion error while using ernie on my own data .I was able to run it for MSRA NER data
i did the pre processing on my text of removing null values converting it to utf-8 and saving it as tsv file

 warnings.warn("Caution! 'set_gradient_clip' is not recommended "
[INFO] 2020-07-11 06:44:08,114 [     init.py:   88]:	Load pretraining parameters from /axp/rim/emvgml/dev/Vishesh/ernie/ernie_gen_large/params.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/axp/rim/emvgml/dev/Vishesh/ernie/ERNIE-repro/ernie/reader/task_reader.py", line 270, in f
    for i in wrapper():
  File "/axp/rim/emvgml/dev/Vishesh/ernie/ERNIE-repro/ernie/reader/task_reader.py", line 261, in wrapper
    examples, batch_size, phase=phase):
  File "/axp/rim/emvgml/dev/Vishesh/ernie/ERNIE-repro/ernie/reader/task_reader.py", line 223, in _prepare_batch_data
    self.tokenizer)
  File "/axp/rim/emvgml/dev/Vishesh/ernie/ERNIE-repro/ernie/reader/task_reader.py", line 403, in _convert_example_to_record
    tokens, labels = self._reseg_token_label(tokens, labels, tokenizer)
  File "/axp/rim/emvgml/dev/Vishesh/ernie/ERNIE-repro/ernie/reader/task_reader.py", line 397, in _reseg_token_label
    assert len(ret_tokens) == len(ret_labels)
AssertionError
/adshome/vgupt137/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/paddle/fluid/executor.py:1070: UserWarning: The following exception is not an EOF exception.
  "The following exception is not an EOF exception.")
